item.title: Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family

Date: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This article discusses the financial support announced by Allu Aravind and others for the family of an eight-year-old boy injured in the tragic Sandhya Theatre stampede that occurred during a screening of Pushpa 2.

  • Allu Aravind announced ₹2 crores to support the family of the injured boy.
  • The boy's mother was killed in the stampede, which happened on December 4.
  • Allu Arjun is currently facing investigation regarding his involvement in the incident.
  • The boy is recovering and has been taken off ventilator support, according to his father.
“The boy, Sri Teja, is recovering. Now he is not on a ventilator. To support the family, we should support him with ₹2 crore.” - Allu Aravind

Despite the ongoing investigation, the support from the film industry highlights the community's response to a tragic incident, focusing on aiding the affected family during a difficult time.

item.title: Raha Kapoor gives flying kisses, says hello to the paps and melts the internet as she arrives with parent - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Raha Kapoor Melts Hearts Arriving for Christmas Lunch with Parents Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt

Publication Date: December 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

This Christmas, the Kapoor family gathered for their traditional lunch, where Raha Kapoor charmed everyone with her adorable greetings to the paparazzi.

  • Raha was seen saying hello and waving at the paparazzi, which made Alia Bhatt laugh heartily.
  • Ranbir Kapoor playfully carried Raha and asked if she wanted to stand outside the car.
  • Alia requested the photographers to be gentle around Raha, noting that she gets scared.
  • Alia was dressed in a stunning red dress while Raha wore a lovely white frock.
  • Ranbir was pictured looking stylish with a moustache, embodying his 'Love And War' character.
  • Both Ranbir and Alia are working on upcoming films, with Ranbir also involved in the project 'Ramayana' set to start next year.
“Thoda dheere, usko darr lagta hai (Be soft, she gets scared),” Alia Bhatt told the paparazzi.

The affectionate moment shared by the Kapoor family reflects their deep bond, charming fans during the festive season.

item.title: Your Christmas just got hotter: 5 raunchy Christmas movies to stream this holiday season! - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 Raunchy Christmas Movies to Stream This Holiday Season

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This holiday season, spice up your movie-watching experience with five raunchy Christmas films that add a deliciously naughty twist to the festivities.

  • Hot Frosty: A lonely widow brings a handsome snowman to life, leading to unexpected romance.
  • The Merry Gentlemen: A big-city dancer aims to save her family’s theatre with a shirtless, Christmas-themed revue.
  • Our Little Secret: A woman navigates family drama when she encounters her ex during Christmas.
  • ‘Twas the Text Before Christmas: A spontaneous trip leads to unexpected friendships and a potential romance.
  • A Paris Christmas Waltz: An accountant and retired dancer find chemistry while competing in a Christmas dance competition.
“Grab your cosy blanket, a box of chocolates, and settle in for a Christmas binge.”

These films promise to bring excitement and laughter to your holiday celebrations, making for a memorable and entertaining viewing experience.

item.title: Malaika Arora finally REACTS to Arjun Kapoor’s ‘I’m single’ comment: ‘I will never choose…’ - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Malaika Arora Responds to Arjun Kapoor's 'I'm Single' Comment

Updated on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Malaika Arora has addressed Arjun Kapoor's recent remark about being single, emphasizing her wish to keep her personal life private.

  • Malaika feels it's unnecessary to discuss personal matters publicly.
  • Arjun confirmed he is single during a public event.
  • Malaika stated, "I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life."
  • She encouraged moving on and welcoming the new year positively.
  • Previously, Malaika playfully engaged with her relationship status on Instagram.
"I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life. So, whatever Arjun has said is entirely his prerogative."

This response highlights her preference for privacy amidst public scrutiny after their breakup.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's career is ‘dead’ as Blake Lively's filing is ‘just the start’ of legal war: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Blake Lively Accuses Justin Baldoni of Sexual Harassment: A Legal Battle Begins

Publication Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has filed a civil rights complaint against her co-star Justin Baldoni, accusing him of sexual harassment during the filming of 'It Ends With Us'. The legal actions mark the beginning of a significant legal feud, impacting Baldoni's career as allegations of a smear campaign arise.

  • Blake Lively files a complaint alleging sexual harassment against Justin Baldoni.
  • The complaint includes accusations of a retaliatory smear campaign orchestrated by Baldoni's PR firm.
  • Baldoni's career has taken a hit; he has lost representation from talent agency WME.
  • Legal expert predicts Lively could potentially win millions from the lawsuit.
  • The situation draws parallels to the Johnny Depp-Amber Heard legal battles.
  • Baldoni’s reputation is severely impacted, with increasing support for Lively from the film industry.
“It's absolutely reputation-related. She has, between her and her husband, all the money in the world.” - Attorney Camron Dowlatshahi

This case highlights serious allegations in the entertainment industry, with significant reputational implications and a potential long-lasting impact on Baldoni's career.

item.title: Christmas 2024: From Rupali Ganguly to Arjun Bijlani-Neha Swami; celebs give a peek into their celebrations - The Times of India
item.description:
Christmas 2024: From Rupali Ganguly to Arjun Bijlani-Neha Swami; celebs give a peek into their celebrations

Date: December 25, 2024 Source: Times of India

This Christmas, stars like Rupali Ganguly, Arjun Bijlani, and Neha Swami opened their doors to fans, offering a glimpse into their festive celebrations. From cozy family moments to vibrant decorations and heartfelt traditions, these celebrities embraced the spirit of the season with love, joy, and togetherness.

  • Rupali Ganguly posed in a white saree by a beautifully decorated tree, sharing her festive joy.
  • Arjun Bijlani celebrated with his family, spreading warmth through cheerful pictures.
  • Shrenu Parikh integrated her Christmas festivities with her family milestones.
  • Karishma Tanna emphasized love and gratitude in her heartfelt Christmas message.
  • Priyanka Chahar Choudhary joined a star-studded Christmas celebration alongside many other celebrities.
“Merry Christmas 2024 !! Stay blessed everyone,” - Arjun Bijlani

The article showcases how celebrities adapt their celebrations to share joy and togetherness, making the Christmas spirit come alive within their extravagant lifestyles.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 20: Only 2% Drop On 3rd Tuesday, Allu Arjun Now Eyeing The 800 Crore Club!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Sukumar’s directorial Pushpa 2 is bringing cheer this Christmas season, with Allu Arjun's film continuing to perform well at the box office. The official figures for the third Tuesday collections have been released.

Maintains an outstanding hold!

The film earned 11.50 crores yesterday, showing minimal drop from 11.75 crores on day 19, with the total collection in the Hindi belt now at 715.75 crores.

Day-wise Box Office Breakdown:

  • Week 1: 433.50 crores (8-day extended week)
  • Week 2: 199 crores
  • Day 16: 12.50 crores
  • Day 17: 20.50 crores
  • Day 18: 27 crores
  • Day 19: 11.75 crores
  • Day 20: 11.50 crores

Total: 715.75 crores

Will it unlock the 800 crore milestone?

The film faces competition with the release of Baby John, which could affect its performance, but it is on track to potentially be the first Hindi film to reach the 800 crore mark.

Note: Box office numbers are based on estimates and have not been independently verified.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Box Office (Worldwide): $100 Million Milestone Unlocked In Overseas, Set To Achieve A Bigger Global Feat! - Koimoi
item.description:
Mufasa: The Lion King Box Office Surpasses $100 Million Globally

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

The movie Mufasa: The Lion King is experiencing a turnaround at the box office, having crossed significant milestones domestically and internationally.

  • The film has reached $105.2 million at the international box office after collecting $15 million on Monday.
  • Domestically, the movie has accumulated $42.4 million, consolidating its global box office total to $147.6 million.
  • It is projected to surpass the $150 million mark soon and potentially reach $200 million by Thursday.
  • The film's opening weekend saw disappointing numbers, with $35.4 million in the US and $122.2 million worldwide.
  • Mufasa competes closely with Sonic 3, which has also been performing well at the box office.
“Mufasa experienced a tepid debut at the box office in the US and worldwide.”

Although initially underwhelming, upcoming holiday periods are expected to boost the film’s earnings significantly.

item.title: Mika Singh is ‘angry’ that Anant Ambani didn’t gift him a Rs 2 crore watch at wedding, admits he got paid enough to last him five years - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mika Singh Expresses Disappointment Over Missing Rs 2 Crore Watch from Anant Ambani's Wedding

Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Singer Mika Singh expressed his discontent after not receiving an expensive watch gifted to other performers at Anant Ambani's wedding, despite being well-compensated for his performance.

  • Mika revealed he felt upset for not being included in the list of recipients for the luxury watches worth Rs 2 crore.
  • Despite his disappointment, he acknowledged being paid sufficiently to sustain himself for five years.
  • He commented on the changing perception of artists performing at weddings, noting it is now more acceptable and lucrative.
  • The wedding featured extravagant gifts, including luxury watches to Anant's groomsmen and celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan and Ranveer Singh.
Mika said, “I was paid a lot of fees... I got so much money that I could easily spend five years with it.”

In conclusion, while Mika Singh is grateful for his earnings, he humorously highlights a personal grievance regarding the lack of a wedding gift, illustrating the sometimes complicated dynamics of celebrity and wealth.

item.title: Retro Teaser: Blend Of Love n Gangster Action.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Suriya's Retro Teaser: Blend Of Love n Gangster Action

Publication Date: Christmas Day

Source: Great Andhra

The teaser for Suriya's gangster drama #Suriya44 directed by Karthik Subbaraj has been revealed, showcasing a captivating blend of action and romance.

  • The film's title, Retro, hints at important narrative themes.
  • Suriya plays a character trying to leave behind a violent past while proposing to his love interest, played by Pooja Hegde.
  • The teaser features the couple in various looks that span different time periods, adding complexity to their story.
  • Highlights include Suriya's conflicting roles as a gangster and romantic lead, enhanced by impressive cinematography and music.
  • Produced by Suriya's 2D Entertainment, the film promises thrilling visuals and engaging performances.
“The teaser highlights the contrasting facets of the protagonist - both his ferocious gangster side and his softer, romantic side.”

Overall, Retro is anticipated to be a commercial entertainer that combines gripping storytelling with intense action and romance.

item.title: Stunning first-look poster of Vishwak Sen’s Laila revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
Stunning first-look poster of Vishwak Sen’s Laila revealed

Published on Dec 25, 2024 12:08 pm IST | Source: OTT

Mass Ka Das Vishwak Sen is taking on an unconventional role in his upcoming film Laila, showcasing his versatility.

  • Vishwak Sen plays both a male and female character in the romantic action entertainer.
  • The film is directed by Ram Narayan and marks Akanksha Sharma’s Telugu debut.
  • Laila is produced by Sahu Garapati under Shine Screens.
  • Earlier, Laila’s eye look was revealed, which garnered a positive response.
  • The first look features Vishwak Sen in a stylish avatar, complete with trendy attire and gold accessories.
  • The film is scheduled for release on February 14, coinciding with Valentine’s Day.
“The complete look of the female character is kept under wraps at the moment, while Vishwak Sen has undergone a significant transformation for his role.”

Expectations are high for 'Laila' as it promises to be a unique cinematic experience highlighting Vishwak Sen's acting range.

item.title: Shraddha Kapoor had me beaten up for rejecting her proposal, says Varun Dhawan: ‘I regretted turning her down’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Recalls Childhood Encounter with Shraddha Kapoor Over Rejection

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interaction, Varun Dhawan shared a humorous anecdote from his childhood involving Shraddha Kapoor. The two, who have been friends since they were children, experienced a memorable incident due to a rejected proposal.

  • Varun Dhawan and Shraddha Kapoor were childhood friends.
  • At age eight, Shraddha confessed her love to Varun, which he rejected.
  • In response, Shraddha had Varun beaten up at her tenth birthday party by her admirers.
  • Years later, Varun realized he regretted turning down Shraddha when he saw her as a teenager.
  • Varun and Shraddha have worked together in films like ABCD 2, Street Dancer 3D, and Stree 2.
“It was Shraddha’s tenth birthday party. She had invited me, and I was surrounded by guys who liked her. They started fighting with me. I was beaten up because I wasn’t accepting her proposal.” – Varun Dhawan

This playful story highlights the lighthearted dynamics of their friendship and how childhood crushes can lead to unexpected outcomes.

item.title: Varun Dhawan BREAKS SILENCE on misconduct allegations with Kiara Advani: “I have fun with my male co-stars as well, but nobody mentions that” - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Varun Dhawan BREAKS SILENCE on misconduct allegations with Kiara Advani: “I have fun with my male co-stars as well, but nobody mentions that”

Publication Date: January 28, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actor Varun Dhawan has responded to allegations of inappropriate behavior with his female co-stars, Alia Bhatt and Kiara Advani. The actor clarified that his actions were misinterpreted after clips of him interacting with actresses during promotional events went viral.

  • Varun addresses controversy regarding his interactions with Alia Bhatt and Kiara Advani.
  • He emphasizes that playful behavior is common among co-stars and that such actions are often misconstrued.
  • Varun explains that the kissing incident with Kiara was planned for a digital cover shoot.
  • His latest film, Baby John, releases globally, with strong box office predictions.
This kiss is so soft ????❤️????

In conclusion, Varun Dhawan seeks to clear the air around the allegations while promoting his upcoming film, hoping to shift the focus back to his work in the industry.

item.title: Days after Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai were spotted together, good news for the actress as... - India.com
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Receives Recognition from the Academy Amid Abhishek Bachchan Sightings

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: India.com

Following recent public sightings of Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai, which quelled divorce rumors, Aishwarya received another positive piece of news as she was featured by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.

  • Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan recently appeared at their daughter Aaradhya's school function.
  • The Academy shared a picture from her film Jodha Akbar, announcing an exhibition featuring her wedding lehenga.
  • The exhibition is titled "COLOR IN MOTION" and highlights the craftsmanship of the lehenga designed by Neeta Lulla.
“A lehenga fit for a queen, designed for the silver screen. Look closely and you’ll spot a peacock, India’s national bird, made entirely of jewels.”

This recognition is another highlight in Aishwarya's illustrious career, showcasing Indian representation in global cinema.

item.title: Boney Kapoor admits he ‘gets attracted to females’, but Sridevi will always be the love of his life: ‘Till my dying day…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Boney Kapoor admits he ‘gets attracted to females’, but Sridevi will always be the love of his life: ‘Till my dying day…’

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Film producer Boney Kapoor reflects on his everlasting love for his late wife, Sridevi, amidst his confessions about attraction towards other women.

  • Boney Kapoor expresses that Sridevi will always hold a special place in his heart, despite any attractions he may feel.
  • He speaks about the challenges and growth in relationships over time.
  • Boney highlights the depth of his love by stating he will always cherish Sridevi until his last breath.
“We were inseparable. I was in love with her, I am in love with her, and I will be in love with her till my dying day…”

This article sheds light on the profound bond Boney had with Sridevi and how he navigates feelings of attraction to others while keeping her memory alive.

item.title: Shivarajkumar's surgery in the US successful - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Shivarajkumar's Surgery in the US Successful

Published: 25 December 2024, 05:37 IST

Bengaluru: A press statement sharing the health update of Kannada actor Shivarajkumar said that the actor is now in a stable condition after the medical procedure performed earlier today.

The procedure was conducted under the supervision of Dr Murugesh Manoharan. In a video statement, the doctor confirmed the success of the surgery and stated that Shivarajkumar’s vitals remained stable throughout the operation and during post-operative care.

"The cancerous bladder was removed successfully with a complete clearance of the disease. Following this, an artificial bladder was recreated using his own intestine,"
the doctor said in the video statement.

The actor left for Florida last week for the surgery in Miami Cancer Institute.

item.title: Sridevi didn’t speak to Boney Kapoor for six months after he proposed: ‘You’re married with two kids, how can you talk to me like this?’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Boney Kapoor Reflects on His Proposal to Sridevi and Their Relationship Journey

Date: December 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Boney Kapoor opens up about the difficult period surrounding his proposal to Sridevi, who initially rejected him due to his marriage and children. Despite this, they went on to marry, and Boney shares insights on the nature of long-term relationships.

  • Boney proposed to Sridevi while still married with children.
  • Sridevi did not speak to him for six months after the proposal.
  • Boney believes in transparency in relationships and advises honesty with partners and children.
  • He expresses enduring love for Sridevi, saying he will love her till his last breath.
“Understanding between a couple should increase with every passing year. Lovey-dovey relationships without any differences don’t last long.”

Boney reflects on his journey with Sridevi and the challenges they faced, emphasizing the importance of honesty and transparency for lasting relationships.

item.title: RC 16: DOP Ratnavelu shares excitement about reuniting with Ram Charan - 123telugu
item.description:
RC 16: DOP Ratnavelu shares excitement about reuniting with Ram Charan

Published on Dec 25, 2024 10:02 am IST

Global star Ram Charan is set to start filming for RC 16, with cinematographer Ratnavelu expressing his enthusiasm for the collaboration, following their previous success with Rangasthalam.

  • The shoot for RC 16 has recently commenced in Mysore.
  • Ram Charan is currently promoting his film Game Changer, releasing on January 10, 2025.
  • RC 16 is a political drama directed by Shankar and stars Kiara Advani as the female lead.
During #RC 16 shoot in Mysore … Exciting to collaborate with @AlwaysRamCharan bro after Rangasthalam 🔥

This reunion is highly anticipated, as it promises to bring together the successful team once more.

item.title: REVEALED: Salman Khan features as Agent Bhai Jaan in a ROCKING cameo in Baby John - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan Shines as Agent Bhai Jaan in Baby John Cameo

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The highly anticipated film Baby John was released today, featuring a much-talked-about cameo by superstar Salman Khan as Agent Bhai Jaan, which is expected to delight fans.

  • The film has generated significant excitement with its mass appeal and star-studded cast.
  • Salman Khan's cameo adds a fun twist, showcasing both action and comedy.
  • This marks Salman’s second cameo appearance in two months, following his brief role in Singham Again.
  • Producer Murad Khetani revealed that Salman agreed to the cameo in under 10 seconds during their discussion.
  • Salman's birthday is just two days away, coinciding with the film’s release and a teaser for his upcoming film Sikandar.
“Atlee informed me about the requirement for a star for a cameo... it took me an hour to gather the courage to ask him. Finally, I told him... He replied, ‘Yes, done.’” - Murad Khetani

Salman Khan's cameo in Baby John promises to be a treat for fans, aligning with the festive spirit and drawing attention to his upcoming works.

item.title: Soni Razdan shares inside pics from Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor and Raha's Christmas eve dinner - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Soni Razdan Shares Inside Pics from Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor and Raha's Christmas Eve Dinner

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 | Source: Times of India

In a heartwarming family gathering, Soni Razdan shared intimate glimpses from the Christmas Eve dinner hosted by her daughter Alia Bhatt, her husband Ranbir Kapoor, and their daughter Raha.

  • The dinner was attended by family members, showcasing the celebratory spirit of the holiday season.
  • Soni Razdan posted pictures on social media, highlighting the joy and warmth of the occasion.
  • Alia and Ranbir have been sharing glimpses of their family life, connecting with fans during the festive season.
“It’s always a joy to see family gathered together,” Soni expressed in her post.

The festive spirit was palpable as the family shared laughter and meals, embodying the essence of togetherness during the holiday season.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20: Allu Arjun film hunts down Baahubali 2, Dangal records; breaks Rs 1600 cr barrier - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection Day 20

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Director Sukumar’s blockbuster Telugu-language film, Pushpa 2: The Rule, has been on a record-breaking spree since its release last month, maintaining strong performance despite competition.

  • On its 20th day, Pushpa 2 collected Rs 14.2 crore in India.
  • The film surpassed Rs 700 crore in lifetime nett collections, becoming the highest-earning Hindi film ever.
  • Globally, Pushpa 2 has crossed the Rs 1600 crore mark.
  • It is now the third-biggest Indian film of all time, following Baahubali 2 and Dangal.
  • Most revenue has come from the Hindi version, with significant earnings from China.
  • The film's success has been overshadowed by a tragic incident during a screening.
"Pushpa 2 has now passed the Rs 1600 crore mark, making it the third-biggest Indian film of all time."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's success at the box office is remarkable but is complicated by the controversies surrounding its screenings and the star's involvement in recent incidents.
